cast.overview: A motorcycle stunt rider considers committing a crime in order to provide for his wife and child, an act that puts him on a collision course with a cop-turned-politician.
cast.title: The Place Beyond the Pines

details.biography: Jeremie Carlson was born in Upstate New York. His father is of Swedish, Scottish and Irish descent, and his mother is French. Jeremie moved to New York City and completed the Conservatory Program at The Barrow Group Theatre in Manhattan under Seth Barrish and Lee Brock. He is fluent in French and is a dual citizen with Canada and the USA.
details.name: Jeremie Carlson
